refund.title: Refund Policy

overview.title: 1. Overview
overview.body: Customer satisfaction is our priority. This Refund Policy outlines the criteria and process for requesting a refund.

eligibility.title: 2. Eligibility for Refunds
eligibility.body: You may be eligible for a refund within 30 days of your initial purchase if you have not extensively used the premium features. Refunds are provided at our discretion.

process.title: 3. Refund Process
process.body: To initiate a refund request, please contact our support team at support@legacyguard.com within 30 days of purchase. Include your account email and reason for the refund request.

items.item1: Monthly subscriptions after the first 30 days

processingTime.title: 5. Processing Time
